problem_names:
lemma fplus_fzero_left:
  fixes m :: "'a\<cdot>'f::functor_zero_plus"
  shows "fplus\<cdot>fzero\<cdot>m = m"

lemma fplus_fzero_right:
  fixes m :: "'a\<cdot>'f::functor_zero_plus"
  shows "fplus\<cdot>m\<cdot>fzero = m"
translations:
lemma fplus_fzero_left:
  fixes m :: "'a\<cdot>'f::functor_zero_plus"
  shows "fplus\<cdot>fzero\<cdot>m = m"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
    plusU\<cdot>
    (COERCE(udom\<cdot>'f, 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>zeroU)\<cdot>
    m =
    m

lemma fplus_fzero_right:
  fixes m :: "'a\<cdot>'f::functor_zero_plus"
  shows "fplus\<cdot>m\<cdot>fzero = m"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
    plusU\<cdot>
    m\<cdot>
    (COERCE(udom\<cdot>'f, 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>zeroU) =
    m
